channel.title: Just a simple, quick question about VPS hosting
channel.description:
I was wondering, for future reference, what requirements for my VPS should I look for to host a RSPS? Like, if I were to host a server, maybe not the most popular, so around 20-50 players, what requirements should my VPS have?
(Note: By requirements, I mean GHZ processor, how much RAM, about how much Storage and how much Bandwidth.)

item.title: Just a simple, quick question about VPS hosting
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

ya servers only take up about i would say 500-700mb nots much but heavly coded one can be over 1gb so you would need the next cheapest

Read full topic
item.source: Just a simple, quick question about VPS hosting

item.title: Just a simple, quick question about VPS hosting
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

JCor9:

With only like 20-50 player the basic one should work i used the basic and i have 150 players online at one point and it started to lag but not bad

Basic as in like, 1gb RAM and everything? The cheapest one?

Read full topic
item.source: Just a simple, quick question about VPS hosting
